survey_name: Online Tutoring Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online tutoring platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online tutoring platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use online tutoring platforms?

questions.question_text: Which subjects do you primarily seek tutoring for? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which subjects do you primarily seek tutoring for? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using online tutoring platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with an 'Other' option and text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using online tutoring platforms?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring sessions? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of tutoring sessions? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in an online tutoring platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a max selection limit of 3 and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in an online tutoring platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling tutoring sessions on the platform? (1 = Very Difficult, 5 = Very Easy)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring ease of scheduling.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling tutoring sessions on the platform? (1 = Very Difficult, 5 = Very Easy)

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any technical issues while using the platform?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issues you faced.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Display only if Q7 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issues you faced.

questions.question_text: How responsive have the tutors been to your questions and needs? (1 = Not Responsive, 5 = Very Responsive)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring responsiveness.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How responsive have the tutors been to your questions and needs? (1 = Not Responsive, 5 = Very Responsive)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online tutoring platform?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather actionable feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the online tutoring platform?
